bibl.title: Nubian Voices from Edfu: Egyptian Scribes and Nubian Patrons in Southern Egypt.
Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.note: The Esna-Edfu hoard: A debated unity. - Codex British Library Or. 6784 and its colophons. - The Esna-Edfu hoard and medieval Nubian literary culture. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Jacques van der Vliet, Nubian Voices from Edfu: Egyptian Scribes and Nubian Patrons in Southern Egypt.

Adam Łajtar, Grzegorz Ochała & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVII (Warsaw, 2015) pp. 263-277.
The Esna-Edfu hoard: A debated unity. - Codex British Library Or. 6784 and its colophons. - The Esna-Edfu hoard and medieval Nubian literary culture. - Conclusions.
